price: 55. Ma waxaad u tageysaan ragga idinkoo u hawoonaya halkii haweenka? Waxaadse tihiin dad aan garan (Weynida Alle iyo Haybaddiisa oo aan ka cabsan Ciqaabkiisa).
arabic: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: a-innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun tajhalūna
